name: Davidoff - Winston Churchill - The Late Hour - Churchill
brand: Davidoff, Winston Churchill - The Late Hour
additionalNotes: Davidoff Winston Churchill The Late Hour is a blend recognizing the honorary Sir Winston Churchill in the late hours of the night. This is where he found is inspiration. When the street lights dimmed, his creativity sparked. Davidoff celebrates this character with tobacco that is aged in Scotch single malt whiskey casks to bring out a unique complexity and a depth of balanced flavors. Throughout you'll experience varying layers of black pepper, dark coffee, sweetness, leather, wood and spiciness. Â
